title: 10 - Mental Illness and the Way of Weakness
description:
In this episode, we confess and discuss our struggles with depression and mental illness.  Mike also gives his best shot at Pearl Jam Trivia.

- Mike Erre

Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com
